title: National income and economic policy: the supply of money
creator_credit: BBC-TV, Open University and Peter Ramsden
brief_description: This program describes in some detail money supply and the institutions which are concerned in it; it also examinesa the various constraints which make the control of the money supply a difficult matter. The program was made in early 1972, before the monetary system had adapted itself completely to the new arrangements introduced by the Bank of England in late 1971.
